ygData.subject: oh! i just remembered..
ygData.msgSnippet: just remembered an old idea for a neat sk/necro spell that i thought up long ago. the basic idea is that it creates a NEGATIVE lighting effect around the
ygData.messageBody:
just remembered an old idea for a neat sk/necro spell that i thought up long
ago. the basic idea is that it creates a NEGATIVE lighting effect around the
caster. i.e. where a lightstone makes more light around the person who holds
it, this spell would make it darker. either the caster could be immune to
this efffect and see normally, or could see normally by virtue of
infra/ultravision (which any sk should have by the time he would get this
spell..) this would imho be even more fun than voice graft :) and more in
character too, if we are deciding we dont like pets especially. if we really
want to add some utility to this otherwise eye-candy spell, how about make
it reduce NPC react/frenzy range? in other words, the max range at which an
npc can detect you is reduced. this spell would obviously be more useful in
the middle of the night or in a crowded dungeon.. if you ran around circled
by a patch of darkness in north karana in the middle of the day, you would
probably attract attention rather than dismiss it :) and the PvP uses
against humans (the non-evil ones.. hehe), barbarians, and erudites is
obvious ;) i like the simplicity, i like the image, and i like the
origionality. it helps that i thought it up myself too. 8) so what do you think?


btw.. we already have heart flutter at lvl 39 :) just so ya know pat

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro

P.S. if i were to suggest a change to our existing high level spell
selection, make the lvl 49 ultravision/detect spell lower. the evil races
can all see with ultravision anyway, and as a human lvl 49 is kind of late
to be getting that spell if i am going to get it at all :)
